title: Crime Alert 11.13.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.13.18
description:
Robert Durst pleads not guilty to the murder of a friend.  Ian Long posts disturbing messaged as he killed 12 in a California bar.  Man found dismembered in his neighbors home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
